item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 19, 2025 at 4:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. New research reveals the strongest solar event ever detected, in 12350 BC (92 points | 37 comments)
2. “There are people who can see and others who cannot even look” (59 points | 8 comments)
3. Spaced repetition systems have gotten better (762 points | 436 comments)

6. France Endorses UN Open Source Principles (319 points | 76 comments)

8. $30 Homebrew Automated Blinds Opener (218 points | 91 comments)

10. The principles of database design, or, the Truth is out there (7 points | 1 comment)

26. In Memoriam: John L. Young, Cryptome Co-Founder (180 points | 19 comments)
27. Living beings emit a faint light that extinguishes upon death, study (47 points | 18 comments)
28. Mystical (374 points | 44 comments)
29. Emergent social conventions and collective bias in LLM populations (52 points | 16 comments)
